banner.quality: We build and renovate residential and commercial spaces. Casco or turn‑key. Clear SOW, schedule, and cost control.

proposedWorks.restorationDesc: Looking for a company with years of experience in restoration? You’ve come to the right place!
proposedWorks.renovationDesc: Building renovation or remodeling? See how we do it and who we have worked for.
proposedWorks.maintenanceDesc: We provide maintenance for various organizations, including government institutions.
proposedWorks.newConstructionDesc: Want to build something new? We are happy to assist with new construction or remodeling so you can enjoy it for years.

representation.title: Let’s get acquainted!
representation.text1: For 9 years, Nuvion has been your reliable partner in the Netherlands, specializing in comprehensive maintenance, restoration, and renovation of projects of any scale – from cozy private homes and outbuildings to modern commercial spaces. Our priorities are always uncompromising quality, deep professional expertise, and attention to every detail – that’s why we are proud of the many successfully completed projects for a wide variety of clients.
representation.text2: We do much more than just carry out construction work: our employees have a genuine passion for their craft and know how to find solutions where others give up. We support each other, are always open to dialogue, contribute useful ideas, and are ready to be a proactive partner at every stage of cooperation. For us, clarity and trust are essential – that’s why we create realistic plans, provide fully transparent estimates, and always communicate honestly with all clients.
representation.text3: Would you like to learn more about how we can help you specifically? Simply click the button below – we will be happy to answer all your questions and provide you with the most suitable solution.

prescription.text1: Experts in restoration, renovation and maintenance with a fresh perspective
prescription.text3: Dedicated employees through continuous development and craftsmanship
prescription.text4: Exceptional customer satisfaction through personal attention
prescription.text5: Modern techniques with a focus on sustainability
prescription.text6: Clear and accessible communication, always sincere

aboutUs.aboutNuvion1: Our dedicated team has been working on home renovations since 2010. In 2025, we founded Nuvion B.V., carrying over our people, methods, and quality unchanged. We deliver complete renovations, extensions, and energy upgrades without hassle.
aboutUs.aboutNuvion2: Specializations: roof extensions and dormers, home extensions, converting attics into living spaces, insulation and HR++ glass, bathrooms and toilets, kitchens, turnkey solutions.
aboutUs.aboutNuvion3: Work activities: installing interior walls, placing or replacing beams, custom-made metal or wooden stairs, carpentry, staircase renovation, roof renovation or replacement, roof windows and skylights, roof terraces, new or renovated electrical systems, replacing or expanding fuse boxes, lighting, ventilation, plumbing and heating, electric or water-based underfloor heating, sound and thermal insulation, selective interior demolition. We work dust-free and clean up daily.
aboutUs.aboutNuvion4: Assurance: at least a 3-year warranty*. Payment per milestone with transparent invoices.
aboutUs.aboutNuvion6: Portfolio and references: many completed projects. Responses on business days usually within 1 hour.
aboutUs.aboutNuvion7: *Guarantees and terms are stated in the quotation and order confirmation.
aboutUs.whatWeDo1: * Complete renovations of apartments and family houses: from demolition and rough construction to full finishing.
aboutUs.whatWeDo2: * Bathrooms, kitchens, toilets: demolition, relocating pipes, electrical work, ventilation, tiling, sealing, installation and finishing.
aboutUs.whatWeDo3: * Internal remodels and extensions: openings in load-bearing walls with steel beams, new layouts, light structural work.
aboutUs.whatWeDo4: * Electrical installations: complete rewiring, additional circuits and RCDs, upgrade of the distribution board, switches and lighting.
aboutUs.whatWeDo5: * Water, heating and drainage: replacing or relocating pipes, installing or replacing radiators.
aboutUs.whatWeDo6: * Ventilation: replacement of mechanical ventilation units, improving ducts, installation of grilles and exhaust points.
aboutUs.whatWeDo7: * Facade, roof and exterior work: facade repair, pointing and impregnation, roof repairs, roof insulation, skylights, fascia boards.
aboutUs.whatWeDo8: * Insulation and energy upgrades: floor and roof insulation, draught sealing.
aboutUs.whatWeDo9: * Frames, doors and carpentry: wooden frames, interior doors, custom furniture, metal stud walls and ceilings.
aboutUs.howWeWork2: 2. Advice and quotation with clear pricing and phased planning.
aboutUs.qualityAndSafety1: Additional work only after prior approval.
aboutUs.pricesAndOptions1: Fixed contract sum per clear scope or hourly rate with weekly reporting. Materials via our suppliers with discount or provided by the client. All amounts excl. 21% VAT, unless stated otherwise.
aboutUs.forWhom1: Private clients, investors and landlords, real estate agents and property managers, homeowners’ associations (HOAs).
aboutUs.areaOfOperation1: The Hague + approx. 35 km: Delft, Rijswijk, Voorburg/Leidschendam, Westland, Leiden, Rotterdam.
aboutUs.portfolioAndRef1: Many completed projects. Response on weekdays usually within 1 hour.
aboutUs.portfolioAndRef2: *Guarantees and conditions are included in the quotation and order confirmation.
aboutUs.pleaseContactUs: Contact us for a non-binding quote.
